metadata.description: The email address of the Matomo Administrator.
The password the Matomo Administrator account.
The username of the Matomo Administrator account.
The custom fully qualified domain name for this matomo instance.
The base URL of the Azure Resource Manager template repository.
The password to use in order to manage the database server.
The username to use in order to manage the database server.
The Matomo application database account password.
The Matomo application database account username.
The database backup retention period in days.
The number of vCPUs allocated to the database.
The size of data storage allocated to the database in MB.
The size of the Matomo Data Disk in giga bytes.

The deployment timestamp. Determines whether the Virtual Machine Custom Script extension is rerun. Default value will have the Virtual Machine Custom Script extension rerun at each ARM template deployment. Ref.: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/virtual-machines/extensions/custom-script-linux#property-value-details
The name of the provisioned environment. Used to build resource names.
The URI of the SSL Certificate Secret used by the Application Gateway.
The User Identity assigned to the Application Gateway to get the SSL Certificate Secret.
The public base URL of the generic-shell-scripts repository's raw files.
The name of the Azure Location where resources will be created.
The public base URL of this project's repository's raw files.

The short name of the project. This string will be used to name all resources required. It must only contain letters (a-z,A-Z), hyphens (-) and underscore (_) characters, and must not exceed 13 characters in lenght.
Generic tags for any resources.
The fully qualified domain name of the email server to use.
The private IP address of the email server to use.
Optional tags specific to Virtual Machines.
The virtual network IP address prefix. Format is '255.255.255'.
The password to use to connect to the VMSS instances.
The username to use to connect to the VMSS instances.
The time (in seconds) allowed to the Web server backend to fullfil a request.
The size of the virtual machine used as webserver. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-services/cloud-services-sizes-specs for allowed values.

protectedSettings.commandToExecute: [concat('sudo ./setup_web_server --data_disk_size ', parameters('dataDiskSizeGB'), 'G', ' --data_disk_mount_point_path ', variables('webServerVirtualMachineDataDiskMountPoint'), ' --db_server_admin_password ', parameters('databaseAdminPassword'), ' --db_server_admin_username ', parameters('databaseAdminUsername'), ' --db_server_fqdn ', reference(variables('databaseName')).fullyQualifiedDomainName, ' --db_server_matomo_db_name ', variables('databaseApplicationDatabaseName'), ' --db_server_matomo_password ', parameters('databaseApplicationPassword'), ' -db_server_matomo_username ', parameters('databaseApplicationUsername'), ' --db_server_name ', variables('databaseName'), ' --max_execution_time ', parameters('webServerBackendMaxExecutionTime'), ' --smtp_server_fqdn ', parameters('smtpServerFqdn'), ' --smtp_server_private_ip ', parameters('smtpServerPrivateIp'), ' --web_server_fqdn ', if(empty(parameters('applicationCustomFqdn')), reference(variables('gatewayPublicIpName')).dnsSettings.fqdn, parameters('applicationCustomFqdn')), ' > /var/log/setup_web_server.log 2>&1')]
